summary: Phase 1: Extend (or create minimal) Search module to detect public-location keywords and query OpenStreetMap Nominatim for public entities, rendering results in existing results container with scoring overridden (risk_score=0, risk_level=LOW) for those entities only, with no backend restructuring, no UI/layout changes, and no scoring engine modifications.
architectural_notes: Implement as minimal, modular, isolated Search module if none exists; avoid app-wide rebuild/restructure.
Frontend-only integration using OpenStreetMap Nominatim API; no backend restructuring, no persistent storage.
Reuse existing results display container; no new panels or layout/UI redesign.
For public-location results only: force risk_score=0 and risk_level=LOW; override heuristics completely without changing normal search scoring logic.
Remove/avoid any platform references in footer or metadata.

existing_features.title: Implement a minimal, isolated frontend Search module that detects public-location keywords and runs OpenStreetMap Nominatim queries for public entities, without changing backend behavior, without restructuring the app, and without modifying the existing message scoring engine.

Render public-location search results inside the existing results display area (reuse the current results container), matching the existing result format style and without introducing new layout panels or visual redesign.

For all returned public entities from Nominatim public-location searches, override risk output to risk_score = 0 and risk_level = LOW, fully overriding heuristics for those entities only, while keeping normal scoring unchanged for normal searches.
Remove platform references from the application footer and metadata (HTML head/SEO helpers/manifest) so no platform branding or links appear in the footer or metadata.

new_feature_requests.summary: Phase 1 Public Location Search Extension: detect public-location keywords, query OSM Nominatim categories (hospital/police/fire_station/government/emergency), display entity details in existing results area, and override scoring (risk_score=0, risk_level=LOW) for returned public entities only.

projectName: Phase 1: Public Location Search via OpenStreetMap Nominatim (frontend-only, no layout/scoring changes)
